= Introduction =

This is *VoxelPipe*, a voxelization library built in CUDA by
*NVIDIA Research*.

Details about the employed algorithms are given in:

 * "VoxelPipe: A Programmable Pipeline for 3d Voxelization", Jacopo Pantaleoni, High Performance Graphics 2011 - August 2011
  (http://research.nvidia.com/publication/voxelpipe-programmable-pipeline-3d-voxelization)

VoxelPipe references the NIH library available at:
http://code.google.com/p/slash-sandbox/

The main header file defining the high level API for the library is
[http://code.google.com/p/voxelpipe/source/browse/trunk/src/voxelpipe/voxelpipe.h src/voxelpipe/voxelpipe.h].

The rest of the top-level [http://code.google.com/p/voxelpipe/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fsrc%2Fvoxelpipe src/voxelpipe] directory is implementation specific, and is not for the weak of heart.

the [http://code.google.com/p/voxelpipe/source/browse#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fvoxelpipe_test%2Fsrc voxelpipe_test] subdirectory contains a minimal test program showing how to use the library.
